lanCN.closeServerContent: The current phase of game testing has concluded, and the game servers have been shut down. Please stay tuned to our Discord community for more game news.
lanCN.forceUpdate: 发现新版本，请前往商店下载
lanCN.maintenanceContent:
Dear Survivors,

The Shelter is presently undergoing essential upgrade maintenance, and we shall provide you with a supply of resources upon its completion.

Should you require a secure haven to rest temporarily, we warmly invite you to join our official Discord. There, you can engage in meaningful exchanges of survival experiences with fellow commanders during these challenging times.

The Last Home Game Team

lanTW.maintenanceContent:
尊敬的首領：
為了保證您的遊戲體驗，我們正在進行停服優化，結束後我們將為您送上停服補償。
給您帶來的不變我們深表歉意，感謝您的理解和支持！
在停服等待過程中，點擊右下的按鈕，來社區和我們互動吧~
